title: Would you try self-driving ride once it's available in your country or would you wait until it becomes more mainstream? Will it revolutionize our life like the smart phone or is it media hype? - Quora

response.answer_text: I for the life of me can not understand what a person gains out of self driving if you still have to be in a state of control, by law, and as I understand it, still have to carry out action of acknowledgment to confirm you are not sleeping. What is the point of that if a autonomous car is supposed to be that safe? You might as well manually drive it yourself. Plus petrol heads LOVE manually driving themselves, not being carted about in a expensive golf buggy.

I use the full self driving feature on my Tesla Model Y almost every time I drive it. On freeways it takes all the work out of driving. On city streets it definitely needs improvement. I’m anxiously awaiting the new self driving software that has just started being released.
